imdb.plot outline: Can anything really prepare you for the family you inherit when you get married? Mao Rong Rong (Yao Qian Yu) is a sweet young woman who has always been well liked by men but never found the right guy. Then at the age of 30, she meets Yu Ku Ai (Xin Bai Qing) and decides he's Mr. Right although he is divorced and has a son.
imdb.title: Rong Rong and Her Mother in Law
akas: Rong Rong and Her Mother in Law (China)
plot: Can anything really prepare you for the family you inherit when you get married? Mao Rong Rong (Yao Qian Yu) is a sweet young woman who has always been well liked by men but never found the right guy. Then at the age of 30, she meets Yu Ku Ai (Xin Bai Qing) and decides he's Mr. Right although he is divorced and has a son.
